page.title: 07Burton Latimer-Leisure.
page.content: There are many activities for children. The holiday club at the recreation centre has table tennis,badminton, foot ball training & a BMX group. Most children in the town are in some thing.Many children are involved in the uniformed organisations.Others go to the Youth Club disco on Fridays,7-10pm. For the sporting the town has 1 youth soccer team,Burton Dukes.They are not very good & many go to Kettering to play.Meadowside School has plenty of sports to try,soccer,netball,hockey, gymnastics,cricket & athletics. If you are still bored, there is an adventure park, with swings, slides & a putting green.The park is by an alley that leads from Churchill Way to Alexandra St.It is a good place to go.
